```{r setup, include=FALSE, cache=F, message=F, warning=F, results="hide"}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  cache = FALSE, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE
)
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
load("../output/results.rda")



```


### Big 5 Personality Slide
``` {r tab_big5, results="asis"}
var_names <- var_names_big5
tab <- reg_big5$table
tab[12] <- paste(
  "\\\\[-1.8ex] &", var_names$label[1], 
  "&", var_names$label[2], 
  "&", var_names$label[3], 
  "&", var_names$label[4],
  "&", var_names$label[5],"\\\\"
)
esc_var_names <- str_replace_all(var_names$var_name, fixed ("_"), "\\_")
reg_names <- tibble(
  var_name = esc_var_names[c(6:8)],
  label = var_names$label[c(6:8)]
)
for (i in seq(15, 21, by = 3)) {
  pos <- (i-12)/3
  tab[i] <- str_replace(
    tab[i], fixed(reg_names$var_name[pos]), reg_names$label[pos]
  )
}
latex_tab <- c(
  "\\begin{center}",
  "\\resizebox*{!}{0.5\\textheight}{",
  "\\begin{tabular}{lccccc}",
  tab[8:33],
  "\\end{tabular}}",
  "\\end{center}"
)
cat(paste(latex_tab, collapse = "\n"))
```
